ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: In the past week, how much has the COVID-19 pandemic caused you financial problems?
In the past week, how worried were you about COVID-19?
Notes: 0=Extremely Worried- the most worried I've ever been; 1=Very Worried; 2=Somewhat worried; 3=Not very worried; 4=Not worried at all

ElementDescription: Current Employment status - Temporarily laid off?
Current Employment status - Unemployed or looking for work?
Current Employment status - Disabled, permanently or temporarily?
If selected currently working, reduced hours or make less money due to COVID-19?
If selected on leave, is this due to COVID 19?
If selected laid off, is this due to COVID 19?
If selected unemployed or looking for work, is this due to COVID 19?
